description: Ground truth quality criteria for evaluating website builder output

criteria.name: Has index.html
criteria.description: Website includes a main index.html file

criteria.name: Has CSS styling
criteria.description: Website includes CSS styling (inline, embedded, or external)

criteria.name: Has navigation
criteria.description: Website includes navigation elements

criteria.name: Has multiple pages
criteria.description: Website includes multiple HTML pages or sections

criteria.name: Has backend server
criteria.description: Website includes a backend server file (main.py, app.py, etc.)

criteria.name: Valid HTML structure
criteria.description: HTML files have proper structure (DOCTYPE, html, head, body tags)

criteria.name: Working links
criteria.description: Navigation and internal links are properly formatted

criteria.name: Forms present
criteria.description: Website includes functional forms if required

criteria.name: JavaScript functionality
criteria.description: Website includes JavaScript for interactivity

criteria.name: Backend routes
criteria.description: Backend includes proper routes for all pages

criteria.name: Responsive design elements
criteria.description: Website includes viewport meta tag or responsive CSS

criteria.name: Consistent styling
criteria.description: Website has consistent color scheme and typography

criteria.name: Modern layout
criteria.description: Website uses modern layout techniques (flexbox, grid)

criteria.name: Visual hierarchy
criteria.description: Website has clear visual hierarchy with headers, sections

criteria.name: Has meaningful content
criteria.description: Website includes actual content, not just placeholders

criteria.name: Has headings
criteria.description: Website includes proper heading structure (h1, h2, etc.)

criteria.name: Has images or media
criteria.description: Website includes images, videos, or other media elements

criteria.name: Clear purpose
criteria.description: Website clearly communicates its purpose

criteria.name: Proper indentation
criteria.description: Code is properly indented and formatted

criteria.name: Semantic HTML
criteria.description: Uses semantic HTML5 tags (nav, header, footer, article, etc.)

criteria.name: No syntax errors
criteria.description: Code is free of obvious syntax errors

criteria.name: Clean code
criteria.description: Code is readable and well-organized
